Hello, this is the website with the extensive guidelines on trade data download from various sources and manipulation.

       output_dir = "docs/")
rmarkdown::render(input = "data-sources-compilation.Rmd", 
       output_format = rmarkdown::pdf_document(toc = TRUE, toc_depth = 5), 
       output_dir = "docs/")
